data.name: Keyfall - Supporter
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is a way to support the development of the game! It doesn't add anything more than a few decorative things.

Supporter gives you
  • A badge on the profile in-game
  • A badge in the multiplayer
  • More customization options
  • Many more to come...
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: This DLC is a way to support the development of the game! It doesn't add anything more than a few decorative things.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64 bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
